attributes.action: carry out CRB checks on all MPs and potential MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs assume the public are guilty unless they can prove themselves innocent, but somehow (yet again) MPs have different rules. 
Anyone who could be working with vulnerable adults needs a CRB check?
What can be more vulnerable than an adult who needs the help of their MP? How easy would it be for an MP to ... offer a bit more reassurance than is acceptable, or to blackmail someone based on confidential information?
And as their prospective employers, like every employer of someone who could deal one-to-one with vulnerable people, we, the public really ought to know about any issues BEFORE we vote, so logically all candidates should be CRB checked before they are able to stand as candidates.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
